```{r data}
clim_data <- read.table("clim.txt") %>% 
  unique()

#number of unique years = 75
as.factor(clim_data$year)

number_years<-clim_data %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  summarise(COUNT=n())

number_years

```

```{r}
mean_rainfall_output = mean_rainfall(clim_data)
mean_rainfall_output
```
